content.description: A practice project to practice integrating AI into a web app to create an AI powered web application
content.intro: A small practice project to practice building and deploying a web app integrated with AI. Guideline and visual assets provided by Scrimba
content.body: This project was created using vanilla HTML/CSS+JS and the OpenAI API.
content.conclusion: The project will be live soon, stay tuned!
content.imageAltText: Screenshot of ai powered translator app
